QuestData.Title: The Backdoor
QuestData.Description: This will take Mayla some time to adjust to.$b$bThat being said, we should return to Thunder Totem.$b$bJust south of here is a tunnel that should take us through the old drogbar slave enclave and then to an opening beyond.$b$bWe keep a small Skyhorn outpost there to watch and ensure nothing enters or leaves this vault without us knowing about it. They should be able to fly us back.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Mayla Highmountain at Obsidian Overlook.
QuestData.RewardText: I always thought it odd that Ebonhorn never seemed to age. Or at least, he always looked old, but he never got older.
